explains: v. 繁荣，成功；蓬勃发展，健康成长；<古>使成功，使兴旺

sentences.en: He may have to become more conformist if he is to prosper again.
sentences.cn: 如果想再次成功，他可能得更遵守成规。

sentences.en: The town of Breckenridge and its namesake ski area could prosper under the plan.
sentences.cn: 按照这一方案，布雷肯里奇镇及与其同名的滑雪区将会繁荣起来。

sentences.en: The example seems to indicate that some regions can prosper without the Bank's aid as well.
sentences.cn: 这个例子似乎表明，一些地区在没有这个银行援助的情况下也能实现繁荣。
